news_header: Mikko Seppälä's Bachelor's thesis in Theoretical Physics won the Global Undergraduate Awards.
news_text: Mikko Seppälä, a student at the University of Helsinki, received the Global Undergraduate Awards for his Bachelor's thesis in Theoretical Physics, which combined particle physics and astronomy. His work focused on the behavior of a quantum field of strong interaction at very high densities. The thesis was recognized in the fields of mathematics and physics, and Seppälä conducted his research under the guidance of Professor Aleksi and Academy Researcher Risto Paatelainen.
